CustomField.description: Formula: Clone of the Household Mailing address (also a Formula)
CustomField.formula:
IF(npe01__Organization_Type__c == 'Household Account',
Account.BillingStreet & BR() & Account.BillingCity & IF(ISBLANK(Account.BillingCity), "", ", ") & Account.BillingState & " " & Account.BillingPostalCode & IF(ISBLANK(Account.BillingCountry), "", BR()& Account.BillingCountry),
npo02__Household__r.npo02__Formula_MailingAddress__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula: Clone of the Household Mailing address (also a Formula)
CustomField.label: Household Mailing Address
